argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fmptdf.1 | |- F/ x ph |
| 2 |  | fmptdf.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) |
| 3 |  | fmptdf.3 | |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> B e. C ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B e. C ) |
| 6 | 3 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. x e. A B e. C <-> F : A --> C ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) |
